'''Fried Radish Balls''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Fried Radish Balls is available from the start of the game.

Depending on the quality, Fried Radish Balls increases the party's attack by '''66'''/'''81'''/'''95''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
